item.title: Docker
item.description: Table of Contents Commands Start a shell prompt Breakdown of docker image Execute Python commands in container Docker Images python3, java8 and Haskell Commands Start a shell prompt To start a shell script inside a running container docker exec -it <container_name> bash To start a shell script inside an image docker run -it --entrypoint /bin/bash <image> Breakdown of docker image Will show a breakdown of layers of docker image
